name: Distant Travels
description:
This Visual Novel is a work in progress of mine. It's currently mostly up so I can have a point of reference and some kind of dev-log structure. 

So what is the story about?

It's a sci-fi novel. In essence it touches on Quantum Entanglement, and the question - can feelings be entangled?

The looming threat of the Endless White consuming the world..

But wait. You're just you. A network tech working a job with little prospects of moving on... Until, there's a job opportunity.

THE CURRENT ANDROID VERSION IS UNTESTED AND TEXT ETC IS NOT FORMATTED PROPERLY.  I'll fix it when there's more time.

You're more than welcome to try it out and give me feedback as to what you like or dislike so far.

As for now there's only the intro, and spans about 15k words, and no real sprites. 
Expect a lot of editing of already told story in versions to come. I have been struggling a bit with the section that's currently released, as it's been the least fleshed out one. It's all been a rough idea of what I've wanted, but well.. Here it is.

If you're looking for something proper and great to play/read I strongly recommend Limits by Drakes64. It's by far my favorite VN. 

/GruntSteel
